title: new client issue
body: when i click launch to start the new client, it gives an error message saying that it failed to start, is there anyway i can fix this/will this issue be fixed?

replies.body: If the client is giving you some sort of critical failure to launch message, it could mean that your installation somehow got corrupted. Try grabbing our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with the reinstall option checked. Hit me back up if that doesn't help!
I had a similar problem to his, except when I clicked launch it just crashed my client completely, I tried the repair tool but that didnt work, any other solutions?

If your client closed then [Granting League permission to run on your computer should do the trick!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

If it crashed, you should have received an error or crash message, in which case, please share it with us.

I dont have firewall on, League has nothing stopping it from starting besides the fact it wont update off legacy client. Thats not on my end. Thats 100% on theirs

Did you;

* Update Windows
* Disable UAC
* Run the game as an Administrator
* Check your Hard Drive for errors
* Reinstall the game as an Administrator

When you've performed all of these steps, let us know if your issue persists or not.
